item.title: Galaxy S6 Slow Motion Video
item.author: dave@bennettnotes.com (Dave Bennett)
item.description: {{ youtube i9srWjFM-OQ {} Slow Motion seems to be all the rage these days. Every one is trying to do it. It should come as no surprise that the Galaxy S6 also features this. While the Galaxy S6 slow motion video capabilities don’t exactly rival those of the iPhone, it’s still pretty good in its own right. In this video, I use the built in slow motion editor. Of course, a much better way would have been to record the video in 60fps then slow it down in Adobe Premiere.
